result.eng: Shall I buy a bottle of wine?
result.html: An gceannóidh mé buidéal fíonaShall I buy a bottle of wine?
result.ponchtml: An gceannóiḋ mé buidéal fíonaShall I buy a bottle of wine?

result.html: Ceannóidh mé an t-iomlánI'll buy the lot.
result.ponchtml: Ceannóiḋ mé an t-iomlánI'll buy the lot.

result.eng: If I had money, I'd buy a big house.
result.ga: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mór
result.orig: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mór
result.html: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mórIf I had money, I'd buy a big house.
result.ponchtml: Dá mbeaḋ airgead agam ċeannóinn teaċ mórIf I had money, I'd buy a big house.

result.eng: If you lose it, you can buy a new one.
result.ga: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannach
result.orig: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannach
result.html: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannachIf you lose it, you can buy a new one.
result.ponchtml: Má ċailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a ċeannaċIf you lose it, you can buy a new one.

result.html: Ná ceannaigh rud ar bithDon't buy anything!
result.ponchtml: Ná ceannaiġ rud ar biṫDon't buy anything!

result.eng: I can't afford to buy a new car.
result.ga: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannach
result.orig: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannach
result.html: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannachI can't afford to buy a new car.
result.ponchtml: Ní acṁainn dom carr nua a ċeannaċI can't afford to buy a new car.

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht

result.ponchtml: Aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: I am not able to buy it.
result.ga: Níl mé in ann é a cheannacht
result.orig: Níl mé in ann é a cheannacht
result.html: Níl mé in ann é a cheannachtI am not able to buy it.
